data.name: Landing page
data.description: Basic Landing Page to showcase your business. Includes multiple pages, working contact form, mobile friendly etc...

data.name: Page with payment integration
data.description: Another Landing Page for a business but this one also has payment integration implemented with a backend server (Node js) and a MySQL database.

data.name: Twitter bot
data.description: Twitter bot that uses Twitch api to listen every 10 minutes if a ceertain streamer has started streaming, if so it uses Twitter's api to send a tweet.

data.name: Discord bot
data.description: Discord bot that uses Discord's api to update the roles of members of a discord server depending on their payment status saved to a database

data.name: Multiplayer Song Trivia (coming soon...)
data.description: Multiplayer game you can play with friends where you guess artists/songs from each other's playlists.
